name: Virtual Slender Simulator
description:
Slender Virtual Simulator - a game application is a joke where you can chat with a terrible Slender! You are very brave? You are just bored and lonely? Then our app for you!
Slender communicate with our message, prove yourself that you are not afraid! You can select different Slender for communication! Ask him questions and he will answer!
Raffle friends pretend that you hang out with this Slender! Answers will not be common and funny! Add to my friends Slender!
The app does not bear any harm and is only for fun!
You are not dealing with a real person, but only virtual!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will try to make our apps and games even better!
